name: Custom Pet Illustrations
description:
Modern, digital illustrations of your furry friends, illustrated by hand. (No Photoshop filters here!) Each illustration is hand-drawn using a variety of reference photos of your pet to capture their personality. If you've got multiple pets, send in your favourite photos of each of them - even pets who don't always get along can be combined into a portrait to look like the best of friends! Holiday Gifts: Please submit holiday orders as early as possible to ensure delivery in time for Christmas. Orders placed after December 1st cannot be guaranteed to arrive on time. What's Included • one (1) 8x10" print of final artwork, signed by the artist • a high-resolution digital artwork file (for non-commercial use only) • free shipping worldwide How To Order Once your order has been placed, please send an email to itsajemm@gmail.com, and include the following: • a few of your favourite photos of your pet(s), including at least one full-body photo • if you have background colour preferences, please let me know • if you'd like any special additions (i.e. fav. toys, special collars or tags, etc.), please send photos that clearly show the items requested How Long It Takes You will receive a rough copy of your artwork within seven (7) days of receipt of payment and reference photos. If any adjustments are necessary, please let me know! Once the preliminary copy has been approved, final artwork will be prepared and shipped within five (5) days.
Please contact me if you have any questions or special requests, or would like to order a different print size.

name: Custom Digital Portraits
description: Fun digital portraits of you or the whole family! What's Included • a high-resolution digital artwork file (for non-commercial use only) • prints available for an additional fee (contact AJ for details) How To Order Once your order has been placed, please send an email to itsajemm@gmail.com, and include the following: • a few of your favourite photos of yourself/the person to be drawn • your colour preferences for the background • any special requests you have How Long It Takes You will receive a rough copy of your artwork within seven (7) days of receipt of payment and reference photos. If any adjustments are necessary, please let me know! Once the preliminary copy has been approved, final artwork will be prepared and files delivered within five (5) days.

name: Layered Paper Pet Portraits
description:
If you're looking for a unique piece of artwork to hang in your home, a layered paper pet portrait is exactly what you need. Each individual shape is hand-cut from archival-quality paper and arranged to form a 3D piece of art, perfect for a shadowbox frame! Artwork is accented with hand-painted gouache details. What's Included • one (1) 10x10" layered paper portrait of your pet • free shipping worldwide How To Order Once your order has been placed, please send an email to itsajemm@gmail.com, and include the following: • a few of your favourite photos of your pet • some information on your pet's favourite activities / toys • any special requests you have How Long It Takes Layered paper portraits may take between 3 - 6 weeks, depending on your position in the waiting list.
You will receive a pencil sketch that shows the composition of your artwork within five (5) days of receipt of payment and reference photos. If any adjustments are necessary, please let me know at this point, as edits are impossible once layering has begun.
Please contact me if you have special requests or require a different artwork size.

Please note: Christmas orders MUST be placed no later than NOVEMBER 1st in order to guarantee arrival on time.

name: Gift Cards -- Custom Pet Illustrations
description: Custom pet illustrations make a great gift for the pet lover in your life!  Stop searching for the perfect present - surprise them with a gift card from The Art of AJ!
